reviews.review_msg: This is a hard course but Dr. Bahreyni knows his stuff extremely well and is very good at explaining the material. His teaching style is great overall, but he can be a little intimidating to approach. If you are actually interested in Electronics, you will probably love this course.
A harsh teacher who knows his stuff well but does not teach well, and his exams are hard for sure. However, he is a nice marker because he scales.
